text: Sredi beduinov, kotoryye zhivut vokrug vas, a takzhe sredi zhiteley Mediny yest' munafiki, kotoryye uporstvuyut v [svoyem] litsemerii. Ty [, Mukhammad], ne raspoznayesh' ikh, My zhe znayem ikh [khorosho] i nakazhem dvazhdy. A zatem oni budut podvergnuty velikomu nakazaniyu [v budushchey zhizni]
